short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Format JSON content on specified websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JSON Formatter makes JSON data readable and manageable with just one click. Features include:
• Automatic JSON detection and formatting
• Dark/Light theme options
• Customizable expansion levels
• Hover preview for large objects
• Copy formatted JSON to clipboard
• URL-based activation control

Perfect for developers and anyone working with JSON data frequently.
